name: Pencil SpinJitsu
description:
Experience the power of a pencil spinning God as you battle your boredom to face off against your biggest enemy yet: paying attention. Spin your pencil with all your might as you save the universe with your mastered art of SpinJitsu!

Created by:

Zack Pavlica - Lead Programmer

Elias Ekonomou - Lead Art Designer

Jurron Clayton  -  Lead Sound Design

Antonios Savidis - Animations / Level Interface

(All credit to specified assets/soundtracks go out to their creators.)
